column4: anyone have experience with geany?  I need to setup an IDE for c++ in ubuntu and am not familiar with linux setups for g++
geany is a nice little editor.     Not sure if it counts as a full IDE or not.. I never use it for that.
i dont use any of them so i cant.
geany is a much lighter program then other 'ide's' i imagine its not got as many fancy features.
